title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format is different in the dynamic text item compared to the data/text item.
EB: When inputting 'new Date()' as the content for three items and saving and previewing, the expected result is that all three items should show the same format. However, the actual result is that the data and text item show the same format, but the dynamic text item shows a different format.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Retrieve datetime values from a table. 2. Make use of the datetime values in a dynamic text item and a data/text item. 3. Input 'new Date()' as the content for both items. 4. Save and preview the items. Check the format of the datetime values in each item.
